instruction: Generate a poem about the joys of nature.
output:
In Nature there is beauty aplenty,
A wealth of joy, if but you see,
For all of life is represented,
And Nature gladdens you and me.

The life of Nature surges wild,
Creatures all in harmony,
Surrounded by the sights and sounds,
On Nature's Joy we shall rely.

The wonders of a sunrise sky,
The softness of a summer breeze,
The bounty of the lands and seas,
This joy will never cease.

The beauty of Nature is all around,
Calm and serenity abound,
A joy to give us solace in times,
A joy that forever abounds.
